lines.text: That's an insult to both of us. It makes me stupid and you... a whore.
It can't be... all the Ninja are dead...
Doggo is not the answer... nswer... swer... wer... er... r...
You want the final say? You got the final say.
If you saw ninjas, you're seeing ghosts.
If winning overshadows everything, why didn't you teach one of us to lose?
Oh my God! Ninja... ja... ja... ja...
Besides, terrorists are crazy. Mercenaries I understand, but terrorists... puuhh!
